programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: Odlulu is overwhelmed by the pace of NYC, so she uses the Slo-Mo Key to make the city move at a snail's pace. When the key's effects threaten a marathon, Waldo and Wenda are determined to get it back. The Wanderers must pursue Odlulu to save the marathon.

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu uses the Bubble Key to raise a sunken ship in the Bahamas, the Wanderers and Wizard Doubloon must take to the high-seas to catch this bubble-wielding buccaneer before she makes away with the ship's booty.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy's about to play a game of basketball with Big Ears and Deltoid when he realizes that the hoop has been fiddled with. Who could've done that and why? Noddy's investigation leads him to Fuse, who explains that he just wanted to help the toys that weren't as skilled as him. Everyone practises and realises that the best way to improve at sport is to keep practising. Well done Noddy.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Farmer Tom is confused and upset when he finds all his trees and corn knocked over. Noddy decides to investigate: who spoiled Farmer Tom's crops? He soon discovers lots of strange heavy bags scattered all over the farm. Whose are they? Where did they come from? And what could they possibly have to do with Smartysaurus's new hot air balloon?

programme.title: Rupert Bear
programme.desc: Rupert and Ping Pong find a broken bird's nest, containing two eggs, which the Fox Twins have accidentally knocked out of a tree. The Mummy bird is frantic and the friends are determined to save the eggs.

programme.title: Rupert Bear
programme.desc: Rupert, Bill and Raggety meet Astra, a star child who has fallen to earth, but she need their help to return to the starry sky as she's used up too much of her ‘twinkle'

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Wildebeest didn't stampede. They used to stand on the plains and munch grass all day. But there were so many of them and they were eating so much grass that all the animals had to do something about it. Tortoise realized that the Wildebeest weren't the brightest animals in Tinga Tinga and they always did whatever the last beast said. So the animals decided to tell the Wildebeest that ‘they were welcome to stay in Tinga Tinga and they must never RUN!' So what did the Wildebeest do? They ran and they ran and they RAN! So that's Why Wildebeest Stampede! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales
programme.desc: You see there was a time when Chameleon wasn't bright and colourful at all. In fact Chameleon was rather dull and grey… like a rainy day. One day when all the animals are playing games and sheltering from the rains Chameleon decides to slip away because he feels boring. Butterfly comes across Chameleon sitting sadly on a rock and shows him a rainbow. Chameleon can't resist and stands on the Rainbow, and TA-DAH!! He turns red and yellow and pink and green! Chameleon soaks up all the colours of the magical rainbow and now, KAPOW!! Chameleon can be any colour he wants! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse

After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse

programme.title: Uncontrollably Fond
programme.desc: It's a love story of a man and woman who meet again after they broke up in the past. The man, in the presence of his death, wishes to make amends. Their romance will have you seek comfort and hope in love.

programme.title: The Seasons
programme.desc: A talk show brings you music and stories that will "get rid of all your worries and all your concerns."

programme.title: Two Days and One Night 4
programme.desc: Two-day road trip to the beautiful spots in all the corners of Korea! Instead of fancy studio, this on-the-road reality show takes place in the rural sides. While over 10 million Koreans travel abroad each year, the "2 Days and 1 Night" casts travel around Korea - to the mountains, farms, fishing villages, islands - where you can meet the welcoming smiles of our neighbors and the beautiful nature that cleanse our eyes.

programme.title: The Return of Superman
programme.desc: Parenting challenges of "Superman" , the first hero that children encounter when they are born.

programme.title: My Neighbor, Charles
programme.desc: Foreigners who have left their familiar worlds behind and come to the unfamiliar land of Korea! A vivid, real-life adaptation story of foreigners trying to settle into Korean society for various reasons. This reality program warmly portrays their concerns about jobs, marriage, and parenting while living in Korea.

programme.title: Our Golden Days
programme.desc: Everyone has their golden days. Whether now, in the past, or the future. A heartfelt family melodrama that resonates across generations, exploring those dazzling days we all encounter with different meanings.

programme.title: Moving Voices in Spain
programme.desc: When you try to understand a country, is there anything that reveals more than its music? "Moving Voices" follows Korea's artists travelling to different places around the world. While they experience different countries' music and cultures, they embark on a journey to find their true self as a singer. What kind of music and stories will these singers share, as they understand the culture and people from the world?

programme.title: You Are The Best!
programme.desc: What is the warmest, happiest, most deeply touching word in the world? "Mom!" Swept up into the tempest of a new life after her father's death, the youngest daughter of this family begins a search for happiness with her mother.

programme.title: Music Bank

programme.title: Hello Monster
programme.desc: I find my true self through you. A man and a woman meet again at a crime scene - like sworn enemies. They get to work together to solve the crime concealing their true intentions. Then, they fall in love with each other and starts to find their identities.

programme.title: Marie and Her Three Daddies
programme.desc: Marie's turbulent journey to find her father leads to the birth of an eccentric new family, one that proves stronger than blood and more persistent than DNA.

programme.title: A Graceful Liar
programme.desc: A bold yet heartbreaking story of a mother and daughter-in-law who meet through marriage and wage a war of lies to seize the Geonhyang family, struggling for a dramatic reversal of fortune.

programme.title: Are You Human?
programme.desc: A young man falls into a coma. His mother creates an artificial intelligence robot in his likeness that must pretend to be a real human and fool people into believing that he's real until the real son wakes up. He is placed in the midst of a fierce power struggle of a business mogul family in the young man's stead. There's a woman who protects him as a bodyguard but doesn't even know if he's a human or a robot!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Fist of Legend
programme.desc: When Chen Zhen studies in Japan, he finds several Chinese students missing and accidentally uncovers the Black Dragon Society’s conspiracy. A new drug is invented to boost bodies of the Japanese troops in war and the Chinese students are used in their experiments. Chen Zhen vows to take down the evil society and destroy their secret laboratory.

programme.title: RUTE:Toughness Redefined
programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: The Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Phi, a veteran boxer, sets out on a quest for revenge after the ruthless crime lord Ba Rau killed his wife. His journey takes him into the remote village near Foggy Mountain, where he discovers Ba Rau's human trafficking activities. The final showdown is inevitable as Phi must take down Ba Rau to save the villagers and avenge his wife’s death.

programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.desc: The growing regional competition R U Tough Enough is searching for the toughest person from Southeast Asia. Join the search and meet some of the most mentally and physically strong individuals, leading up to an epic final showdown in Kuala Lumpur for the prize of US$15,000!

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Iron Ball
programme.desc: This sports entertainment show brings the best special forces from Iron Squad to take on a new challenge – dodgeball. The 26 players will enter a fierce competition, until a strongest team armed with powerful athletic endurance and mental strength is formed. Witness how they compete in front of the star athletes and legendary dodgeball coaches!

programme.title: The Ultimate BROcation
programme.desc: A hilarious reality show about four famous male celebrities from different countries on an all-expenses-paid fantasy vacation in Hong Kong, tailor-made for the “bros”!

programme.title: Iron Squad W
programme.desc: The fourth season of this Korean military survival show will determine the most elite female soldier. It brings together six Special Force units to compete in challenging missions across land, sea, and air. Top female reservists form teams of four to compete against one another. Witness how they battle to the end in front of six celebrity hosts!

programme.title: Secret Life Of The Pastor's Wife
programme.desc: Angie, the wife of a charismatic pastor who extols family values yet maintains an icy demeanour toward his own, seeks solace from her marital woes in the arms of her recently hired pool boy.

programme.title: As Luck Would Have It: Murder for Sale
programme.desc: Gabbi's longtime friend, Kimberly Stark, is selling her home. But the morning after the very first open house, her broker, Joe Parillo, is found dead in her foyer. Naturally, Kim turns to Gabbi for help.

programme.title: Husband, Father, Killer: The Alyssa Pladl Story
programme.desc: Alyssa and Steven moved in together when Alyssa was an impressionable teen. After they have a daughter of their own, their path takes a dark turn when Steven becomes physically abusive toward the infant.

programme.title: Don't Scream, It's Me
programme.desc: Fifteen years ago, Liz's ex-boyfriend, Drew, was caught robbing a bank. Now, he's in her backyard, asking her to hide him. She agrees to help, but only once her husband is out of the house.

programme.title: Enlighten Your Life (S3)
programme.desc: When we watch comedians on television, they often seem approachable and friendly. But have you ever wondered what their homes look like and how they’re decorated? Today’s theme is "Comedians' Homes."

programme.title: Earth Sweepers

programme.desc: When two best friends hiking the Grand Canyon trust an experienced hiking guide to bring them on an off-trail adventure, things go south when he takes them captive. They have to fight both man and nature.

programme.desc: Forget Taco Tuesday and make tacos every night with Rachael Ray's Easiest Fish Tacos with Red Rice and Black Beans.

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate (S12)
programme.desc: From dumplings to sundaes, these unexpected and delicious food finds are no longer a secret.

programme.title: The Best Thing I Ever Ate (S12)
programme.desc: From savory to sweet, it's pies galore, and Wolfgang Puck picks a perfect fruit and cream pie in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay (S37)
programme.desc: Fashion icon Carson Kressley and pastry chef Stephanie Boswell "zhuzh up" chefs Chris Infinger and Kevin Lee and prepare them for victory over Bobby Flay.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay (S37)
programme.desc: Alex Guarnaschelli and Marc Murphy band together with chefs Daniel Le and Michael Michaelidis to teach Bobby Flay a thing or two about lobster.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: A unique walking-eye view of cities around the globe! Chat to the locals and enjoy encounters that only strolling the streets can bring.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Laugh Then Think
programme.desc: Electrified spoons can make food taste salty, aiding people on special diets. Miyashita Homei uses this technology to recreate a variety of flavors that might reshape the future of food.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The festival on October 22 pays homage to Kyoto's 1200-year history with people parading in period costumes. Discover the citizens' resilience as they created a new Kyoto.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Pointing out a senior coworker's mistake. Kyaw Swar Aung, from Myanmar, works behind the scenes at Narita Airport. He'll tackle a roleplay challenge in which he notices a senior worker's mistake.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Okinawa is home to "Ryukyu Glass," a local industry for over 100 years. Matsumoto Sakae uses discarded bottles to make things to be loved and never again thrown away, doing his part to reduce waste.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The North Korean Abductions Part 1
programme.desc: North Korean agents abducted at least 17 Japanese citizens around the late 1970's. Only 5 returned. We interviewed over 100 former investigators and others to uncover why the case remains unresolved.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The North Korean Abductions Part 2
programme.desc: North Korean agents abducted at least 17 Japanese citizens around the late 1970's. Only 5 returned. We interviewed over 100 former investigators and others to uncover why the case remains unresolved.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN Highlights
programme.desc: The Sanriku Coast was the area hardest hit by the massive earthquake and tsunami of 2011. Its restored communities are rediscovering their local traditions and the unique beauty of this landscape.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.title: u&i
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: J-MELO
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week, all-female band SILENT SIREN (soon marking their 15th anniversary) and 11-member Hello! Project idol group Juice=Juice are in the studio to chat and perform.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-8.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Japan's plastic models are popular worldwide. Shizuoka City leads the nation in plastic model shipments. We look at the city's plastic model industry, from its history to the latest developments.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: Photographer Iwago Mitsuaki reunites with cats from his past! He meets Kurobe, a temple cat, for the first time in six years. He then visits a seaside town to see Ponzu for the first time in twelve.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Laugh Then Think
programme.desc: Electrified spoons can make food taste salty, aiding people on special diets. Miyashita Homei uses this technology to recreate a variety of flavors that might reshape the future of food.

programme.title: Core Kyoto mini
programme.desc: The festival on October 22 pays homage to Kyoto's 1200-year history with people parading in period costumes. Discover the citizens' resilience as they created a new Kyoto.

programme.title: Easy Japanese for Work
programme.desc: Pointing out a senior coworker's mistake. Kyaw Swar Aung, from Myanmar, works behind the scenes at Narita Airport. He'll tackle a roleplay challenge in which he notices a senior worker's mistake.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Okinawa is home to "Ryukyu Glass," a local industry for over 100 years. Matsumoto Sakae uses discarded bottles to make things to be loved and never again thrown away, doing his part to reduce waste.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Somewhere Street
programme.desc: Bari is a port town located at the heel of the Italian peninsula. An important hub of commerce since the time of ancient Rome, it's known for welcoming people of diverse cultures from Asia and Africa.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: IMPACTS: Climates Change the World
programme.desc: Global warming is impacting ecosystems and bird habitats in the world's mountainous regions. In the Japanese Alps, various efforts are underway to protect the endangered Japanese rock ptarmigan.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two crafters of bespoke fashion in Tokyo - German Melanie Uematsu whose specialties include wedding gowns for non-Japanese customers, and Australian Thom O'Brien who creates handmade hats.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Time-lapse Japan
programme.desc: The Jomon period dates roughly from 13,000 to 300 BC. We examine various aspects of Jomon society, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: the Oyu Stone Circles.

programme.title: BOSAI:Disaster Response Robots
programme.desc: When disaster strikes, it can be hard to find people trapped under rubble, while fire, volcanic eruption, or nuclear accidents may bar entry entirely. That's where disaster response robots can help.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to mud. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Easy Japanese
programme.desc: #3 I'm from Vietnam. / Learn how to say where you're from. The formula is the name of the place, followed by "kara kimashita".

programme.title: Tokyo's Largest Indian Community
programme.desc: In Edogawa City, where 40% of Tokyo's Indian population reside, a cultural exchange program gives Japanese residents the chance to visit Indian homes as well as facilities run by Indians.

programme.title: HELLO! NHK WORLD-JAPAN
programme.desc: Cycle Around Japan has teamed up with Taiwan's public broadcaster, PTS, for a three-part series airing this fall. Experience Taiwan's lush scenery, and meet guardians of traditional culture.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CINEMATIC JOURNEY
programme.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japanwhere he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

programme.title: The Masterpieces of Tsutaju
programme.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights ukiyo-e artist Sharaku's debut work "The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei."

programme.title: Seasoning the Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: YONEZAWA: Shirabu Onsen
programme.desc: A 700-year-old hot spring, Shirabu Onsen, is maintained via daily trips up the slopes of the 2,000-meter mountain where it sits. See the hot spring's guardian at work, in gorgeous time-lapse footage.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM
programme.desc: Shoring Up Short-Handed Kitchens: This episode features new services and cooking equipment designed to help restaurants in Japan overcome a deepening labor shortage.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

programme.title: JAPAN DELISH 5min.
programme.desc: Crisp, hot, and delicious Japanese gyoza! How did gyoza come to be so beloved in Japan? Taste the delicious truth for yourself!

programme.title: Nun's Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs show us how to make su-no-mono with dried daikon radish. Just mix rehydrated daikon with red radish and sweet vinegar, and this tasty pink-colored dish is ready to serve.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Nishino Masatoshi didn't know what he wanted to do with his life until he learned about horse logging. Now, he's chasing his dream in the forests of Hokkaido with the help of his trusty sidekick, Kap.

programme.title: Satoyama Kitchen Summer #5
programme.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #3 Autumn
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, two naginata (polearms) associated with legendary warriors: Benkei and Tomoe Gozen.

programme.title: Time-lapse Journey
programme.desc: Kyoto in the autumn: the old capital is even more beautiful when dressed in fall colors. Witness the contemplative and quiet beauty of Kyoto through time-lapse photography.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet two crafters of bespoke fashion in Tokyo - German Melanie Uematsu whose specialties include wedding gowns for non-Japanese customers, and Australian Thom O'Brien who creates handmade hats.

programme.desc: We meet two crafters of bespoke fashion in Tokyo - German Melanie Uematsu whose specialties include wedding gowns for non-Japanese customers, and Australian Thom O'Brien who creates handmade hats.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #5
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Nakajima Hiromitsu makes supportive devices for world-class para-athletes such as gold medal-winning wheelchair tennis player Kamiji Yui. He talks about helping them perform at their best.

programme.title: DOSUKOI Sumo Salon 5 minutes
programme.desc: Only 7% of rikishi make it to the top division. We learn what kind of special perks such top-division rikishi receive, and hear how even some famous Yokozuna had inauspicious beginnings.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Yasutsuna, or Onikirimaru, a blade that was used to defeat a terrible demon.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE(3)
programme.desc: At dusk in summer, a woman is absorbed in reading a letter. This chic lady is actually an advertisement model for Mitsui Echigoya, one of the top kimono fabric stores in Edo.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Adults play the role of the shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture. This episode looks at words related to mud. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Tokyo's Largest Indian Community
programme.desc: In Edogawa City, where 40% of Tokyo's Indian population reside, a cultural exchange program gives Japanese residents the chance to visit Indian homes as well as facilities run by Indians.

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: Lately, it seems Jimmy's only solace can be found at the bottom of a whiskey glass. But when Jimmy's estranged son, Mike (The Killing's Joel Kinnaman), becomes a target, Jimmy must make a choice between the crime family he chose and the real family he abandoned long ago. With Mike on the run, Jimmy's only penance for his past mistakes may be to keep his son from the same fate Jimmy is certain he'll face himself...at the wrong end of a gun. Now, with nowhere safe to turn, Jimmy just has one night to figure out exactly where his loyalties lie and to see if he can finally make things right.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: Sinister Doll
programme.desc: A teenager, Pelangi, chances upon a banana tree plantation which is guarded by a mysterious old man. Apart from finding out that a young girl was buried with her favourite doll in this banana plantation decades ago, Pelangi also uncovers a horrifying secret about her death…

programme.title: Ten Minutes to Midnight
programme.desc: Amy gets bitten by a rabid bat during her last graveyard shift as a veteran punk rock disc jockey. When a storm traps Amy, her mysterious replacement and an anxious staff inside their small-town radio station, reality starts to distort as they go deeper into the graveyard shift…

programme.title: The Windmill Massacre
programme.desc: Jennifer joins a tour to explore the renowned windmills of the Netherlands. As their tour coach breaks down on the way, they seek refuge in a creepy shed near a sinister windmill with a dark history. When some tour members suddenly disappear, Jennifer discovers a shared secret among them, linking their fates in a chilling revelation.

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jing Wen, a struggling drama student, takes on a modelling job to help cover her tuition costs. As she becomes a model for an enigmatic artist specializing in expressive human body sketches, Jing Wen accidentally uncovers a shocking truth, plunging her into a desperate fight for survival.

programme.title: Bahay Na Pula
programme.desc: Jane and her husband Marco go to the ancestral house that Jane inherited from her grandmother. As they move into the house, Jane starts to experience horrifying events and her belly mysteriously grows bigger every day, as if she has gotten pregnant all of a sudden…

programme.title: American Justice
programme.desc: When a loving wife and mother is found stabbed to death inside her home, a team of investigators dedicate eight years to finding her killer.

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?

programme.title: Accused: Did I Do It?

programme.title: Savannah, La Ballade
programme.desc: Savannah, aged six, abandoned by her parents, runs away. She meets Colin and Mailland, two very likeable convicts hiding out in an old farmhouse. They decide to look after her. But the disappearance of the little girl soon alerts the authorities, who set out to track down the fugitives.

programme.title: Dans Le Noir
programme.desc: After surviving the journey across the Mediterranean, a young Guinean migrant finds refuge in Paris with a Senegalese dandy who makes a living by renting out his ID documents.

programme.title: Des Racines & Des Ailes
programme.desc: We discover the Luberon's most gorgeous hill-top villages. Brantes, at the foot of Mont Ventoux, where the locals want to keep their village alive. Rosans, in the Baronnies Provençales, where Jean-François Rousseau helps young growers set up. And Ferrassières, on the Albion plateau, to visit the Château de la Gabelle.

programme.title: 64' - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Quel Avenir Pour Nos Abeilles ?
programme.desc: Apiculture is on the rise in Swiss towns, to the point where the many honeybees are vying with rare wild species and butterflies for food: a problematic situation for the biodiversity. Should we regulate production and make it more respectful of nature?

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Refuges De Montagne - Hiver
programme.desc: At the Tierbergli mountain hut, the season can finally begin. But things are very quiet at the Zapport; military exercises mean that clients are unable to take the shortest route to reach the refuge in Grialetsch. Tanja and Werner decide to take on extra staff.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: Passionate about French chic, ambassadress Katherina Marx surrounds herself with major figures from the worlds of fashion, design, gastronomy, and fine living. Each episode features an iconic guest and a series of special reports, allowing viewers to discover or rediscover France, its young designers, and its chic and trendy hang-outs.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2

programme.title: La Grande Galerie Francophone
programme.desc: Every week and in public, Ali Baddou and his group of columnists receive French-speaking artists who are at the heart of current events and move the lines. Space for exchanges, creations and surprises, ''La grande galerie francophone'' celebrates art in all its diversity and shares it with everyone.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: Ronon Le Corre has been a shellfish picker for the last twenty years, gathering one particular species in the Audierne and Douarnenez Bays: tellines. But in recent years it has become increasingly rare. Plankton, its main source of food, is directly affected by the polluted water released into the sea.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco
programme.desc: Coralie and eleonore have invested in a former hotel dating back to the 20th century, near Reims, to turn it into a shared home in the country.

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: Information and good humour, 7 days a week! Resolutely in tune with the times, the first morning of France, strong of its editorial richness and its team dynamics, addresses many themes and deals with current events with seriousness and without dramatization.

programme.title: Telematin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete on arrow-word grids that they try to fill in by finding the answers to the given clues. But to access the clues, they must first answer questions with a very particular characteristic: the answer is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Cosy, Le Mag Deco
programme.desc: Coralie and eleonore have invested in a former hotel dating back to the 20th century, near Reims, to turn it into a shared home in the country.

But in recent years it has become increasingly rare. Plankton, its main source of food, is directly affected by the polluted water released into the sea.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Yetili
programme.desc: Nina and Leon, two little mice, live in a bookshop whose mascot is a large yeti cuddly toy called Yetili. Each evening, once the bookshop has closed, Yetili comes to life and settles his two friends on his knees to read them a story.

programme.title: Dessine Les Animaux Avec Koumi
programme.desc: Koumi is 6 years old, mischievous and always full of fun. The dream of her life is to know all the animals of the world, and she absolutely loves drawing! In each episode she explains how to draw animals really well.

programme.title: L'Afrik En Contes
programme.desc: A woman has born ninety children: all boys. She decides to disguise one as a girl in order to offer him to the king of the village as a wife. Jealous, one of the king's wives denounces the deception.

programme.title: L'Afrik En Contes
programme.desc: Connonni is a little bird and maid of all work for Bamousso the chicken, who treats her very badly. One day, the king asks everyone to come and work for him. Bamousso sends Connonni in her place, and the little bird finds herself being rewarded for her services.

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Itineraires Paysans
programme.desc: The different attitudes and approaches of French farmers in terms of the environment, economy and landscape. A practical way of understanding a region and its terroir through their working practices.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Au Bout De L'Enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal International
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Le Combat D'Alice
programme.desc: Alice, aged 16, is deeply affected by the death of her mother. While staying with her grandparents, she gets attached to a calf before realising that it is destined for the slaughterhouse. Unable to bear the thought, she commits herself body and soul to the militant cause against animal suffering.

programme.title: Foot! (1/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Foot! (2/2)
programme.desc: Match summaries, commentary and analyses, after each day of the Ligue 1 McDonald's, the French football championship.

programme.title: Avant L'Effondrement
programme.desc: Tristan, campaign director for a parliamentary election candidate, panics when he discovers a positive pregnancy test in his post. Potentially suffering from a fatal genetic disease, he investigates to discover if this is a political trick or a genuine test. Even if it means abandoning his professional and love life.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: When his pet amoeba Spot has puppies, Plankton decides to use them in another of his nefarious plots. // Mr. Krabs is too scared to get his physical, but if he doesn't pass, the Krusty Krab will be shut down!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: Bubble Bass avoids paying his bill at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob and Squidward are sent to collect the cash.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Chloe feels smothered by Max and Phoebe, and encourages them to make new friends. However, the twins unwittingly make the same friend, and begin a battle for the ages over her. Chloe's new alone time is interrupted by living room-crashing pelican.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Billy arrives, hopeful that his new sidekick Steve can join the T-Force. Phoebe and Max consider it, but soon discover that his superpower is making marshmallows. After they reject Steve's bid to join the team, he turns evil and vows revenge.

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Hindi Pa Tapos ang Laban
programme.desc: Fernando Poe Jr. stars as Carding Villamar, a city professional who returns to their hometown of Evangelista after learning of his brother's untimely demise. As a series of events unfold, he soon discovers that his brother didn't succumb to a heart attack as he was made to believe. He was shot in cold blood for refusing to sell his land to a powerful congressman. With a town muted and crippled by fear, the congressman's henchmen move unhampered to silence Carding and his brother's orphaned family as well. Big mistake. Armed with only a crusty riffle and a whole ton of rage. Carding sets out to right the wrong and exact vengeance for the murder of his brother. That is, if he survives the hot pursuits of bounty hunters, the militia and the police who are all in the congressman's payroll.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 4

Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?
